clips.Description: Get close enough to ensure you have good sound and can see their face clearly.
clips.Goal: Ask the character to tell you a story. Capture their emotion.
clips.نکته: از خطوط چشم برای گنجاندن مناسب سوژه در فریم خود استفاده کنید.
clips.Title: Interview

clips.Description: Get close to an object, or person, and capture a memorable detail to summarize your story in one shot.
clips.Goal: Show an essential detail to the story.
clips.Tip: The detail should fill at least 50% of the frame.
clips.Title: Signature

clips.Description: Let the camera observe the character relating to friends, their work, demonstrating their knowledge, or completing an action.
clips.Goal: Show an interaction between the character and their world.
clips.Tip: The character should fill about 30% of the frame.
clips.Title: Interaction

clips.Description: Step back. This shot should be wide enough to depict the character from head to toe in their location.
clips.نکته: کاراکتر خود را بر روی یک خط عمودی فرضی نگه دارید ک فیلم مناسب تری از او تهیه کنید
clips.Title: Activity

clips.Description: Landmarks or location specific are ideal to include. Environmental shots can help indicate the country, ethnicity, or religion of your character.
clips.Goal: Show where your story takes place.
clips.Tip: Place your camera directly in front of the primary location you are filming.
clips.Title: Location
